CustomField.description: Shows the Quote Line Net Total if the Product Type is Operations & is not a subscription product
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Product_Type_Test__c = "Operations", ISBLANK(TEXT( SBQQ__SubscriptionPricing__c ))), SBQQ__NetTotal__c , NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows the Quote Line Net Total if the Product Type is Operations & is not a subscription product
CustomField.label: Net Total OneTime
